modName: Joseph Anthonys Lip Gloss for Better Females
summary: A specular map designed for Better Females by Bella that simulates lip gloss.
descriptionHtml:
Joseph Anthony\'s Lip Gloss for Better Females
---------------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION:  This mod is simply an alternate specular texture for use with the Better Females By Bella mod.  Its goal is to simulate a lip gloss effect.


REQUIREMENTS: None. HOWEVER, this mod was designed for use with the Better Females by Bella mod, which can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812&navtag=file/images.php?id=2812&tab=3
The results that you get with other face texture mods may vary.


INSTALLATION: Simply place the data folder contained in the mod archive inside your installation folder so that the folder hierarchy is copied over.  

MY OTHER MODS:  Be sure to check out my character mod that utilizes this mod.  You can find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14258
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/4056/maliseacharacterbyjosep.jpg[/img]


BARELY RELATED GARBAGE: If you like my mods, perhaps you\'ll enjoy my other artwork -- music.  Check me out on SoundCloud at http://soundcloud.com/joseph_anthony, and keep an eye out for an upcoming Skyrim mod scored completely by yours truly.
author: Joseph Anthony
